## tlserver sync

Sync DMFR files to database

### Synopsis

Sync DMFR files to database



```
tlserver sync [flags] <filenames...>
```

### Options

```
      --dburl string            Database URL (default: $TL_DATABASE_URL)
  -h, --help                    help for sync
      --hide-unseen             Hide unseen feeds
      --hide-unseen-operators   Hide unseen operators
```
